Knowledge: 从盒子导出月租车数据恢复到中心
Solution: select c.`no` as '车牌',v.startdate as '起始时间',v.enddate as '结束时间',v.mealid as '套餐ID',m.nickname as '套餐名',p.`Name` as '姓名',p.`No` as '人事编号',p.CellPhoneNo as '手机号码',p.RoomNo as '房号' from crd_credential c,crd_virtualslot v,crd_person p,sys_setmeal m where c.personid=v.personid and c.personid=p.id and c.state=1 and v.mealid=m.id;|复制以上SQL语句在盒子数据库中执行，然后通过中心Excel模板导入

Knowledge: 更换主板后，场内月租车要收费
